defs.docs: A library for 2D graphics that works with multiple back-ends.

defs.name: BACK_END_MAX_VERTEX_COUNT
defs.docs:
Any triangulation method called on the back-end
 never exceeds this number of vertices.
 This can be used to initialize buffers that fit the chunk size.

defs.name: Texture
defs.docs: The texture type associated with the back-end.

defs.name: clear_stencil
defs.docs: Clears stencil buffer with a value.

defs.name: tri_list
defs.value: fn <F> (&mut self, draw_state: &DrawState, color: &[f32; 4], f: F) -> ()

defs.name: tri_list_uv
defs.value: fn <F> (&mut self, draw_state: &DrawState, color: &[f32; 4], texture: &<Self as Graphics>::Texture, f: F) -> ()

defs.name: rectangle
defs.value: fn <R> (&mut self, r: &Rectangle, rectangle: R, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d) -> ()

defs.name: polygon
defs.value: fn (&mut self, p: &Polygon, polygon: types::Polygon, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d) -> ()

defs.name: polygon_tween_lerp
defs.value: fn (&mut self, p: &Polygon, polygons: types::Polygons, tween_factor: Scalar, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d) -> ()
defs.docs: Draws a tweened polygon using linear interpolation.

defs.name: image
defs.value: fn (&mut self, image: &Image, texture: &Self::Texture, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d) -> ()

defs.name: ellipse
defs.value: fn <R> (&mut self, e: &Ellipse, rectangle: R, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d) -> ()

defs.name: line
defs.value: fn <L> (&mut self, l: &Line, line: L, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d) -> ()

defs.name: circle_arc
defs.value: fn <R> (&mut self, c: &CircleArc, rectangle: R, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d) -> ()

defs.name: deform_image
defs.value: fn (&mut self, d: &DeformGrid, texture: &Self::Texture, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d) -> ()

defs.name: SourceRectangled
defs.docs:
Should be implemented by contexts that
 have source rectangle information.

defs.name: src_rect
defs.value: fn (self, x: i32, y: i32, w: i32, h: i32) -> Self

defs.name: src_rel
defs.value: fn (self, x: i32, y: i32) -> Self
defs.docs:
Moves to a relative source rectangle using
 the current source rectangle as tile.

defs.name: src_flip_hv
defs.docs: Flips the source rectangle horizontally and vertically.

defs.name: Rectangled
defs.docs: Should be implemented by contexts that have rectangle information.

defs.name: margin
defs.docs: Shrinks the current rectangle equally by all sides.

defs.name: expand
defs.docs: Expands the current rectangle equally by all sides.

defs.name: rel
defs.value: fn (self, x: Scalar, y: Scalar) -> Self
defs.docs: Moves to a relative rectangle using the current rectangle as tile.

defs.name: Transformed
defs.docs: Implemented by contexts that can transform.

defs.name: append_transform
defs.docs: Appends transform to the current one.

defs.name: prepend_transform
defs.docs: Prepends transform to the current one.

defs.name: trans
defs.value: fn (self, x: Scalar, y: Scalar) -> Self
defs.docs: Translate x an y in local coordinates.

defs.name: orient
defs.value: fn (self, x: Scalar, y: Scalar) -> Self
defs.docs: Orients x axis to look at point locally.

defs.name: scale
defs.value: fn (self, sx: Scalar, sy: Scalar) -> Self

defs.name: zoom
defs.docs: Scales in both directions in local coordinates.

defs.name: flip_hv
defs.docs: Flips horizontally and vertically in local coordinates.

defs.name: Colored
defs.docs: Implemented by contexts that contains color.

defs.name: mul_rgba
defs.value: fn (self, r: ColorComponent, g: ColorComponent, b: ColorComponent, a: ColorComponent) -> Self
defs.docs: Multiplies with red, green, blue and alpha values.

defs.name: tint
defs.docs: Mixes the current color with white.

defs.name: shade
defs.docs: Mixes the current color with black.

defs.name: default_draw_state
defs.docs: Returns a default draw state that does additive blending and no culling.

defs.name: clip_draw_state
defs.docs: Returns a default draw state that does additive blending and no culling.

defs.name: inside_draw_state
defs.docs: Returns a default draw state that does additive blending and no culling.

defs.name: outside_draw_state
defs.docs: Returns a default draw state that does additive blending and no culling.

defs.name: size
defs.docs: The size of character, including space.

defs.name: width
defs.docs: Gets width of character, including space to the next one.

defs.name: height
defs.docs: Sets height of character, including space to the next one.

defs.name: CharacterCache
defs.docs: Stores characters in a buffer and loads them by demand.

defs.name: Texture
defs.docs: The textyre type associated with the character cache.

defs.name: character
defs.value: fn (&mut self, font_size: FontSize, ch: char) -> &Character<<Self as CharacterCache>::Texture>

defs.name: width
defs.docs: Return the width for some given text.

defs.name: new_viewport
defs.docs: Creates a new context with absolute transform in point coordinates.

defs.name: new_abs
defs.docs: Creates a new drawing context in absolute coordinates.

defs.name: view
defs.docs: Moves the current transform to the view coordinate system.

defs.name: reset
defs.docs: Moves the current transform to the default coordinate system.

defs.name: store_view
defs.docs: Stores the current transform as new view.

defs.name: draw
defs.value: fn <G> (&self, polygon: types::Polygon, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d, g: &mut G) -> ()
defs.docs: Draws polygon using the default method.

defs.value: fn <G> (&self, polygon: types::Polygon, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d, g: &mut G) -> ()

defs.name: draw_tween_lerp
defs.value: fn <G> (&self, polygons: types::Polygons, tween_factor: Scalar, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d, g: &mut G) -> ()
defs.docs: Draws tweened polygon with linear interpolation, using default method.

defs.name: draw_tween_lerp_tri
defs.value: fn <G> (&self, polygons: types::Polygons, tween_factor: Scalar, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d, g: &mut G) -> ()
defs.docs: Draws tweened polygon with linear interpolation, using triangulation.

defs.name: Line
defs.docs: A colored line with a default border radius

defs.docs: The radius of the arc (Thickness of the drawing, not the radius of the circle)

defs.docs: The start of the arc in radians

defs.name: end
defs.docs: The end of the arc in radians

defs.name: radius
defs.docs: Sets the radius of the arc (Thickness of the arc, not the radius of the circle it wraps)

defs.name: start
defs.docs: Sets the start of the arc (in radians).

defs.name: end
defs.docs: Sets the end of the arc (in radians).

defs.name: resolution
defs.docs: Sets the resolution of the arcs smoothness.

defs.value: fn <R, G> (&self, rectangle: R, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d, g: &mut G) -> ()
defs.docs: Draws circle arc using default method.

defs.value: fn <R, G> (&self, rectangle: R, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d, g: &mut G) -> ()

defs.name: resolution
defs.docs: The resolution for the shape, 360 degrees.

defs.name: resolution
defs.docs: Sets resolution of the ellipse smoothness.

defs.name: draw
defs.value: fn <R, G> (&self, rectangle: R, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d, g: &mut G) -> ()

defs.docs: Round corners, with resolution per corner.

defs.docs: Creates a new round rectangle border.

defs.name: draw
defs.value: fn <R, G> (&self, rectangle: R, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d, g: &mut G) -> ()
defs.docs: Draws the rectangle using default method.

defs.value: fn <R, G> (&self, rectangle: R, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d, g: &mut G) -> ()

defs.name: rectangle
defs.docs: The rectangle to draw image inside

defs.docs: Contains type aliases used in this library

defs.name: ColorComponent
defs.docs: The type used for color component.

defs.name: FontSize
defs.docs: The type used for font size.

defs.name: modular_index
defs.docs: Helper functions for computing modular index safely.

defs.name: offset
defs.value: fn (n: usize, i: usize, off: isize) -> usize
defs.docs: Computes modular offset safely for indices.

defs.name: round
defs.docs: Whether or not the text's position should be rounded (to a signed distance field).

defs.name: new
defs.docs: Creates a new text with black color

defs.name: round
defs.docs: A builder method indicating that the Text's position should be rounded upon drawing.

defs.value: fn <C, G> (&self, text: &str, cache: &mut C, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d, g: &mut G) -> ()
defs.docs: Draws text with a character cache

defs.name: triangulation
defs.docs: Methods for converting shapes into triangles.

defs.name: tx
defs.value: fn (m: Matrix2d, x: Scalar, y: Scalar) -> f32

defs.name: ty
defs.value: fn (m: Matrix2d, x: Scalar, y: Scalar) -> f32

defs.value: fn <F> (m: Matrix2d, polygons: Polygons, tween_factor: Scalar, f: F) -> ()
defs.docs: Streams tweened polygons using linear interpolation.

defs.name: with_ellipse_tri_list
defs.value: fn <F> (resolution: Resolution, m: Matrix2d, rect: Rectangle, f: F) -> ()
defs.docs: Streams an ellipse specified by a resolution.

defs.value: fn <F> (resolution_cap: Resolution, m: Matrix2d, line: Line, round_border_radius: Radius, f: F) -> ()

defs.value: fn <F> (resolution_corner: Resolution, m: Matrix2d, rect: Rectangle, round_radius: Radius, f: F) -> ()

defs.name: stream_polygon_tri_list
defs.value: fn <E, F> (m: Matrix2d, mut polygon: E, mut f: F) -> ()
defs.docs:
Streams a polygon into tri list.
 Uses buffers that fit inside L1 cache.

defs.name: with_ellipse_border_tri_list
defs.value: fn <F> (resolution: Resolution, m: Matrix2d, rect: Rectangle, border_radius: Radius, f: F) -> ()
defs.docs: Streams an ellipse border specified by a resolution.

defs.value: fn <F> (start_radians: Scalar, end_radians: Scalar, resolution: Resolution, m: Matrix2d, rect: Rectangle, border_radius: Radius, f: F) -> ()
defs.docs: Streams an arc between the two radian boundaries.

defs.name: with_round_rectangle_border_tri_list
defs.value: fn <F> (resolution_corner: Resolution, m: Matrix2d, rect: Rectangle, round_radius: Radius, border_radius: Radius, f: F) -> ()

defs.value: fn <E, F> (m: Matrix2d, mut quad_edge: E, mut f: F) -> ()
defs.docs: Streams a quad into tri list.

defs.name: with_polygon_tri_list
defs.value: fn <F> (m: Matrix2d, polygon: Polygon, f: F) -> ()
defs.docs:
Splits polygon into convex segments.
 Create a buffer that fits into L1 cache with 1KB overhead.

defs.name: rect_tri_list_xy
defs.docs: Creates triangle list vertices from rectangle.

defs.name: rect_border_tri_list_xy
defs.value: fn (m: Matrix2d, rect: Rectangle, border_radius: Radius) -> [f32; 48]
defs.docs: Creates triangle list vertices from rectangle.

defs.name: rect_tri_list_uv
defs.docs: Creates triangle list texture coords from image.

defs.name: math
defs.docs: Various methods for computing with vectors.

defs.name: abs_transform
defs.docs: Transforms from normalized to absolute coordinates.

defs.name: orient
defs.docs: Orients x axis to look at point.

defs.name: separation
defs.docs:
Compute the shortest vector from point to ray.
 A ray stores starting point and directional vector.

defs.name: least_separation_4
defs.value: fn <T> (sep1: Vec2d<T>, sep2: Vec2d<T>, sep3: Vec2d<T>, sep4: Vec2d<T>) -> Vec2d<T>
defs.docs:
Returns the least separation out of four.
 Each seperation can be computed using `separation` function.
 The separation returned can be used
 to solve collision of rectangles.

defs.name: margin_rectangle
defs.docs: Shrinks a rectangle by a factor on all sides.

defs.name: relative_rectangle
defs.docs: Computes a relative rectangle using the rectangle as a tile.

defs.name: overlap_rectangle
defs.docs:
Computes overlap between two rectangles.
 The area of the overlapping rectangle is positive.
 A shared edge or corner is not considered overlap.

defs.name: relative_source_rectangle
defs.value: fn (rect: SourceRectangle, x: i32, y: i32) -> SourceRectangle
defs.docs:
Computes a relative source rectangle using
 the source rectangle as a tile.

defs.name: modular_offset
defs.docs: Computes modular offset safely for numbers.

defs.name: area_centroid
defs.docs: Computes the area and centroid of a simple polygon.

defs.name: area
defs.docs: Computes area of a simple polygon.

defs.name: centroid
defs.docs: Computes centroid of a simple polygon.

defs.name: line_side
defs.docs: Returns a number that tells which side it is relative to a line.

defs.name: inside_triangle
defs.docs: Returns true if point is inside triangle.

defs.name: triangle_face
defs.docs: Returns true if triangle is clockwise.

defs.name: to_barycentric
defs.docs: Transforms from cartesian coordinates to barycentric.

defs.name: from_barycentric
defs.docs: Transforms from barycentric coordinates to cartesian.

defs.name: hsv
defs.value: fn (color: Color, h_rad: f32, s: f32, v: f32) -> Color
defs.docs: Transform color with hue, saturation and value.

defs.name: deform
defs.docs: Least square deforming of a 2D grid.

defs.name: DeformGrid
defs.value: DeformGrid { cols, rows, rect, vertices, indices, texture_coords, ps, qs, wis }

defs.name: cols
defs.docs: The number of columns in the grid.

defs.name: rows
defs.docs: The number of rows in the grid.

defs.name: rect
defs.docs: The grid undeformed, which is a plain rectangle.

defs.name: qs
defs.docs: The current position of control points.

defs.name: wis
defs.docs: A weight computation buffer, one for each control point.

defs.name: new
defs.value: fn (rect: Rectangle, cols: usize, rows: usize) -> DeformGrid

defs.name: set_current
defs.value: fn (&mut self, i: usize, pos: Vec2d) -> ()

defs.name: set_original
defs.value: fn (&mut self, i: usize, pos: Vec2d) -> ()

defs.name: reset_vertices_and_texture_coords
defs.docs: Sets vertices and texture coords back to default.

defs.name: hit
defs.docs:
Finds original coordinate.
 If the deformed grid is overlapping itself, multiple hits might occur.
 Returns the first hit it finds.

defs.name: draw_image
defs.value: fn <G> (&self, texture: &<G as Graphics>::Texture, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d, g: &mut G) -> ()
defs.docs: Draws deformed image using default method.

defs.value: fn <G> (&self, texture: &<G as Graphics>::Texture, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d, g: &mut G) -> ()

defs.docs: Adds a control point, in original coordinates.

defs.value: fn <G> (&self, line: &Line, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d, g: &mut G) -> ()

defs.name: draw_horizontal_lines
defs.value: fn <G> (&self, line: &Line, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d, g: &mut G) -> ()

defs.name: update
defs.docs: Updates the grid, by deforming the vertices.

defs.name: grid
defs.docs: A flat grid with square cells.

defs.docs: Represents a flat grid with square cells.

defs.name: units
defs.docs: The width and height of each grid cell.

defs.name: GridCells
defs.docs: Iterates through the cells of a grid as (u32, u32).

defs.name: draw
defs.value: fn <G> (&self, line: &Line, draw_state: &DrawState, transform: Matrix2d, g: &mut G) -> ()

defs.name: cells
defs.docs: Get a GridIterator for the grid

defs.docs: Get on-screen position of a grid cell

defs.docs: Get on-screen x position of a grid cell

defs.docs: Get on-screen y position of a grid cell
